title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Set to Begin Monday
sub_head: Socialite is accused of conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls
body:
Opening statements in the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, the British socialite accused of conspiring with disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls, are expected to begin Monday in federal court in Manhattan.
The trial, which is set to last about six weeks, is expected to provide a window into what prosecutors have described as Epsteinâ€™s sex trafficking of dozens of minors in New York, Florida and elsewhere.
